flawed_nl_solution:
He gets his pool cleaned 30/3=<<30/3=10>>10 times a month
Each time he gets it cleaned he tips 150*0.1=$<<150*0.1=15>>15
So he pays 150+15=$<<150+15=165>>165
So he pays 165*10=$<<165*10=6150>>6150 a month on cleaning
The chemicals cost 200*2=$<<200*2=400>>400
So in total, he pays 6150+400=$<<6150+400=6550>>6550
#### 6550

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1650, not 6150. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
